name: Big Brain Mills
description:
Welcome to Big Brain Mills. Do you want to train your brain? Prove your logic and claim victory in head to head battle against your friends or the game AI.

Big Brain Mills is a modern implementation of the ancient Nine Men's Morris game. With roots dating back from the early years of the Roman Empire this game was played more than twenty centuries. Known all over the world this is the perfect trainer for your brain. The simple logic allows for fast, addictive and deep gameplay.

Nine Man's Morris, Mill, Mills, Merels, Merelles and Merrils are only few of the known names of this game. Remade with polished graphics and special effects Big Brain Morris offers unlimited hours of fun.
